People

#EEGManyLabs is only possible thanks to the contributions of a global network of researchers committed to improving the field. Project coordinators oversee planning and communication; lead labs manage individual study logistics; an advisory board supports rigorous design and analysis; and replication teams collect data worldwide. From early career scientists to established investigators, contributors are shaping the projectâ€™s success through openness, collaboration, and mutual learning.
